subject: re:Introduce special discounts for all our customers
body:
Dear valued member.
The Spring Sale at MyCanadianPharmacy is on - hurry up to best generic Canadian products with an up-to-20% discount.
Why waste too much on drugs made in the USA if we can buy a Canadian one - a product as qualitative and effective as the American drug but a much cheaper one at the same time.MyCanadianPharmacy is an official dealer of products made by Canadian branches of such pharmaceutical manufacturers as Pfizer, Procter & Gamble, etc.
Check out our Spring Specials right now.http://showweek.hk
-------------------------------------------
Sincerely yours,Steve Hodgee-mail: dwcnnsearchm@cnnsearch.comwww: http://showweek.hk
